channel.title: Plant Architecture on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Plant Architecture on COTTON

item.title: GhCUC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCUC2 Gene Name: CUP-SHAPED COTYLEDON2 Genome: reference genome TM-1 (AD1) genome NAU-NBI Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The miR164-GhCUC2-GhBRC1 module regulates plant architecture through abscisic acid in cotton.

item.title: GhCUL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A11G1857 Gene Symbol: GhCUL1 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhDREB1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G245100 Gene Symbol: GhDREB1B Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A copy number variant at the HPDA locus on Chromosome D12 (HPDA-D12), encoding a dehydration-responsive element-binding (DREB) transcription factor, GhDREB1B, strongly affects plant architecture in the AS98 mutant.

item.title: GhPAS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G0607 Gene Symbol: GhPAS1 Gene Name: PAGODA1 SUPPRESSOR 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The bHLH transcription factor GhPAS1 mediates BR signaling to regulate plant development and architecture in cotton.

item.title: GhUBP15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A01G038500 Gene Symbol: GhUBP15 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.
